page.title: 09Clubs for young people
page.content:
The playgroup is from 3to4 years. Sometimes they go on trips.They meet every week.
The Brownies is for girls aged 7to11 years.They play games and raise money for charity.
The Cubs is for boys aged 8to11 years. They play games and have sales.
The Guides is from 11to14 years.They have games ,make collections,put on plays and sometimes go camping. These are all held in the school.
The Youth Club is from 9to16 years. there is a dart board,snooker table,pool table and table tennis.It is held in a concrete and cement hut beside the recreation field "the rec".
